title: Effects of oil increase, tech change, etc on RGDP

content.description:
In answering the question, you should emphasize the line of reasoning that generated your results; it is not enough to list the results of your analysis. Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes.

How does each of the following changes affect the real gross domestic product and price level of an open economy in the short run? Explain each.

(a) An increase in the price of crude oil, an important natural resource

(b) A technological change that increases the productivity of labor

(c) An increase in spending by consumers

(d) The depreciation of the countryâ€™s currency in the foreign exchange market
